snippet.title: Ferral Quest - Game Trailer (EN)
snippet.description:
2D pixel RPG game.
One player (for now).
Open world. With different biomes: forest, jungle, desert, snowy wasteland, volcanic. In addition to dozens of dungeons to explore and hidden secrets.
Open world PVE missions, special dungeons.
Raid Bosses and Wanderers to hunt scattered around the world.
Progression from Tier 0 to Tier 10.
Develop your skill tree to make your character unique.
Different buffs and equipment so you can forge your strategy in battle.
Get the best equipment by destroying big bosses in their dungeons.
History:
A great narrated adventure to discover who you were before you were resurrected as a skeleton and find out how to free yourself from your curse. Well, you will soon lose your sanity and become part of the army of warrior slaves of the great necromancer known as Ferral.
Characteristics:
*Simple and intuitive controls. With an accessible information panel that explains any gameplay queries in detail.
*Achievement panels, hunt all the bosses in the game and complete your panel 100%. In addition, you can also complete the panel of mythical objects found. Ferral Quest won't make it easy for you.
*Collaboration with streamers and content creators. Each of these streamers has chosen a Raid Boss as their representative champion. Hunt them all down!
*Side quests scattered throughout the open world: You can help a merchant search for lost items, or you can mine resources while waves of underground beings try to prevent it, or you can pray to the gods and they will bless you... or not, and send his troops to destroy you as punishment.
*Advance in the main story and evolve your character. You will start as a skeleton but no one knows what you will become at the end of your adventure.
Guaranteed fun.
Can you defeat the necromancer Ferral and find out who you were before you resurfaced as a skeleton with no memories?

Play Ferral Quest: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ZonaBitsGames.FerralQuest&pcampaignid=web_share

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/TEUagvGmwa
